This game is very fun to play, specially with friends. The only gripe I have with this game are campers. A problem that really needs to be tackled because it sucks out all of the fun of the game itself.

Edited: I had a lot of fun playing, but a game that supports NFTs is a big no in my book - specially when they didn't make it clear from the beginning that player's money for dlc etc would go to NFTs. Be transparent with your community, this is not okay.
Yes very good game highly recommend if you enjoy thiller games that get your heart pumping

Ignoring the fact that there are a lot of toxic players and small bugs (e.g. questionable hit boxes, servers not working-only sometimes, perks -self care- taking precedence over basic actions such as opening the exit gates, repairing gens etc.) which are solved in a decent amount of time, Dead by Daylight its a really GREAT game and I recommend it. You can earn free cool looking items for killer and survivor as well just by playing the game (e.g. the rift comes with cool challenges that make you play the game in a fun way, promo codes and anniversaries). You will never get bored! (maybe just when you're waiting for a lobby but that's another story that you will experience yourself :)) 

   If you like survival horror games that you can play with friends, then DbD its the right place for you! <3
